response.overview: Yoko and I. Occupation is Queen. Lately, I'm in trouble because there are a lot of egomasochists. I don't know if he's a psychologist the other day, but he came to my store and was pretentious. I knew right away that he was a masochist. You're already in love with me Ah, that's right, Shibu is training a child right now. I'm proud to say that I want to be a novelist, but it caught my attention. He's a true masochist. He cheats on his girlfriend Tae-chan, and then he enjoys bullying Tae-chan. From my point of view, I'm drunk with my sad self in such a situation. You're the worst ego-masochist ever.
response.title: Beehive
